text: @narendramodi Sir, no doubt you are doing very well to overcome this outbreak. Here, to take your kind notice that biggest mistake has been done by Italy 🇮🇹 and USA 🇺🇸 that they have common hospitals for coronavirus and other patients, if we not make separation there We can’t control 🛑
